question: What type of DMD can casimersen be used for?
ideal_answer: Casimersen can be used for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD) in patients who have a mutation in the DMD gene that is amenable to exon 45 skipping.

snippets.text: Casimersen received its first approval on 25 February 2021, in the USA, for the treatment of DMD in patients who have a confirmed mutation of the DMD gene that is amenable to exon 45 skipping.

exact_answer: exon 45, confirmed mutation of the DMD gene that is amenable to exon 45 skipping, amenable to exon 45, amenable to exon 45 skipping
